title: Medication Management UI
description:
Medical Medication Management System - Forms Implementation

Build a comprehensive medication management interface with three integrated forms for healthcare providers to safely order, administer, and reconcile medications.

Requirements:

1. Medication Order Form:
   - Capture medication name, dosage, route, frequency, and duration
   - Include prescriber information and timestamp
   - Support both scheduled and PRN (as-needed) orders
   - Validate against contraindications and drug interactions
   - Include allergy checking before order submission
   - Support order modifications and discontinuation workflow

2. Medication Administration Record (MAR) Form:
   - Display scheduled medications with administration times
   - Allow nurses to document administration, including actual time given
   - Support partial doses and refusal documentation
   - Capture administration route and site (for injections)
   - Enable reason codes for missed or delayed doses
   - Include barcode scanning capability for medication verification

3. Drug Database Reconciliation:
   - Integrate with external drug database API (e.g., RxNorm, FDA drug database)
   - Validate medication names against standardized database entries
   - Display drug monograph information (indications, side effects, interactions)
   - Flag discrepancies between ordered and database-standard formulations
   - Support medication reconciliation during admission, transfer, and discharge
   - Show alternative medications or generic equivalents

Technical Considerations:
   - Implement real-time validation to prevent medication errors
   - Ensure HIPAA compliance for all data handling
   - Include audit logging for all medication-related actions
   - Handle offline scenarios with sync capability
   - Support multi-language drug names where applicable

Success Criteria:
   - All forms pass clinical workflow validation
   - Zero tolerance for medication ordering errors
   - Sub-second response time for database lookups
   - 100% audit trail coverage
